description.value:
You execute your finishing moves with spectacular flair, adding special effects to your finishers. If a Strike you make as part of a finisher hits a foe, you add one of the following effects to the Strike, depending on your swashbuckler's style.

Gymnast: If the foe is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Grabbed]{Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Restrained]{Restrained}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Prone]{Prone}, you gain a circumstance bonus to the damage roll equal to twice the number of weapon damage dice.
